creator: khammond25@home.com
text:
The user interface allows a user to add elements to a leaf node by right-
clicking the element and selecting Open from the context menu.  For example, 
you can see this by right clicking on a WebTesting: Url Sample element. You can 
add any file and all of the contents will be placed in the Url Sample element.

Marking all bugs RESOLVED before JMeter 1.8's release date as VERIFIED.
Yes, it's pretty poor QA procedure, but there's bugs here lingering since JMeter
1.6, and we need to clean up a little.
creator: jsalvata@atg.com

text: Bulk-closing all bugs RESOLVED before JMeter 1.8 release date.
creator: jsalvata@atg.com
